Screenwriter: Stephen White, Sheryl Leach, Dennis DeShazer, Stephen White
Production Co: PolyGram Filmed Entertainment, Lyrick Studios Video, Lyons Group
Sound Mix: Surround, Dolby SR, DTS, Dolby Digital, Dolby A, Dolby Stereo
Synopsis: When city kid Cody's (Trevor Morgan) trip to his grandfather's farm turns out to be a big bummer, who's to save the day but Barney! Cody's imagination brings the dinosaur to full musical life, and a wish upon a star sends down a magical, mysterious egg -- but what's inside?
Title: Barney's Great Adventure
